DeploymentOperationOperations

DeploymentOperationOperations

Operations for managing deployment operations.
NOTE: An instance of this class is automatically created for an
instance of the [ResourceManagementClient] {@link
ResourceManagementClient~ResourceManagementClient}.
See [deploymentOperations] {@link
ResourceManagementClient~ResourceManagementClient#deploymentOperations}.
Initializes a new instance of the DeploymentOperationOperations class.

Constructor

new DeploymentOperationOperations(client)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
client ResourceManagementClient

Reference to the service client.
Source:
  • resourceManagementClient.js, line 222

Methods

get(resourceGroupName, deploymentName, operationId, callback) → {Stream}

Get a list of deployments operations.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
resourceGroupName string

The name of the resource group. The name
is case insensitive.
deploymentName string

The name of the deployment.
operationId string

Operation Id.
callback function

The response stream.
